summary: This is a weekly sign-in sheet for the Protective Custody Unit (PCU) at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for the week of August 4-10, 2019. It records staff visits and rounds, and is significant as it covers the period when Jeffrey Epstein was held in the PCU prior to his death.

events.title: Start of Weekly PCU Monitoring
events.description: A new weekly sign-in sheet is implemented for the Protective Custody Unit at MCC, as per standard procedure every Sunday.

events.title: End of Weekly PCU Monitoring
events.description: The weekly sign-in sheet for the Protective Custody Unit at MCC concludes.

keyFacts: This document is a staff sign-in log for the Protective Custody Unit at MCC for the week of August 4-10, 2019.
The document shows standard prison administrative procedure for monitoring staff access to the protective custody unit.
The completed forms were to be routed to the Associate Warden of Programs to ensure staff compliance.
The document covers the period immediately before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, while he was held in the PCU.
No specific individuals are legibly named in the provided text; all names appear to be signatures or initials that are not clearly decipherable.
